title: Volume 3

texts.title: The Epistle Dedicatory
texts.sourceDesc: In 1690, Norris published his [Christian Blessedness, or, Discourses upon the Beatitudes of Our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ], following this up in 1691 with a set of [Practical Discourses upon Several Divine Subjects]. In 1693 the latter was reprinted as “Volume II”, as was another set titled “Volume III”. Thus the original [Discourses on the Beatitudes] retrospectively became Volume I of these [Practical Discourses]. A fourth volume was printed in 1698.
